moTa: The smart ForTwo is available as a convertible and coupe. The 2017 ForTwo starts at $14,650 (MSRP), with a destination charge of $750. It gets EPA-estimated 34 MPG combined. The smart ForTwo competes against models like the Honda Civic, Scion tC, and Kia Forte Koup. The ForTwo is a good fit for sun lovers Sun Lover vehicles have convertible tops or removable roofs. The smart ForTwo Electric Drive is available as a convertible and coupe. The 2018 ForTwo Electric Drive starts at $23,800 (MSRP), with a destination charge of $750.
